fr.xephi.authme.service

Class PluginHookService

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.xephi.authme.service.PluginHookService

  • public class PluginHookService
extends Object
    Hooks into third-party plugins and allows to perform actions on them.

        Parameters:

        socialSpyStatus - The social spy status (enabled/disabled) to set

      • getEssentialsDataFolder

        public File getEssentialsDataFolder()
        If Essentials is hooked into, return Essentials' data folder.
        Returns:
        The Essentials data folder, or null if unavailable

        public org.bukkit.Location getMultiverseSpawn(org.bukkit.World world)
        Return the spawn of the given world as defined by Multiverse (if available).
        Parameters:
        world - The world to get the Multiverse spawn for
        Returns:
        The spawn location from Multiverse, or null if unavailable

        public boolean isEssentialsAvailable()
        Returns:
